name: EATON PX Blue Design Pattern Library
description:
Migrated to a new file due to a recent organizational change.


Welcome to the Power Xpert Blue design pattern stickersheet! This is a design library that includes common patterns used across various PX Blue projects. Feel free to copy and paste anything you like into your own projects.


Visit pxblue.github.io/patterns to learn more about our design patterns.


Changelog


March 2021

v2.4.0 (R19)


We expanded our Design Pattern Library with examples of all of our design patterns! Visit our website to learn more.

New patterns:

  • App Bars
  • Internationalization
  • Lists
  • Loading and Waiting
  • Overlay: Dialogs and Pagers
  • Search
  • Steppers
  • Tables
  • User Authentication
  • Visualization

Many of these patterns have prototype animation embedded in them.

Also check out our Component Sticker Sheet community file!


December 2020

V2.3.6 (R18)


  • Added design pattern examples for forms, side sheet and lists.
